document.full_text: dozens of workers battling to control radiation at japan's stricken reactors face a far greater risk of developing cancer than normal, but tokyo residents are within the safe range for exposure, u.s. nuclear experts said.
document.title: radiation poses only slight risk to nervous tokyo: experts
lines_and_colors: dozens of workers battling to control radiation at japan's stricken reactors face a far greater risk of developing cancer than normal, but tokyo residents are within the safe range for exposure, u.s. nuclear experts said.
